Header.title: Freeman | Art Company
Header.paragraph: FAC is an art logistics platform connecting collectors with artists in a modern way. Our mission is to tear down the barriers preventing people from experiencing art and supporting their passion - revolutionizing how art is exchanged, and how collectors engage with artists and fellow collectors.

About.paragraph: Freeman Art Company is an art logistics platform connecting artists to collectors in a way that supports rising artists while exposing the community to the arts. We use technology to elevate the scope and magnitude of your ability.
About.subparagraph: Our mission is to humanize art so that all may enjoy this beautiful part of life. We do this by revolutinizing how art is pucharsed, and how artists connect with collectors and their peers alike. For the collector, their home becomes a gallery, providing new experiences year round. For the artist, their phones become a tool to earn monthly income.

Services.name: Lifestyle
Services.text: Find artists based on their lifestyle (hobby, alma mater, religion, etc.)

Services.name: Personality Matching
Services.text: We connect you with artists based on similar personality results, as well as other collectors.

Services.name: More Ways to Buy
Services.text: Why just stop at purchases? How about financing, rotating, auctioning, and commissions?

Services.name: No Middleman
Services.text: Cheaper for you, more for the artists

Services.name: Blue Chip Fund
Services.text: Fractionalized ownership of investment grade art

Services.name: Earn through Sales as a Collector
Services.text: Flip the script, now you can earn on your collection.

Features.title: Lower Costs
Features.text: No more fees raising the price of art

Features.title: Artist Feed Tailored for You
Features.text: No more clutter for finding paintings that speak to you

Features.title: Broader Selection
Features.text: Artists from all over. Go local or explore art from new areas
